title: REGISTRATION
description: You need to complete a simple registration form with all required contact information before starting the donation process.

title: HEALTH CHECK
description: Your blood pressure, pulse, temperature, and hemoglobin levels will be checked to ensure you are fit for donation.

title: SCREENING
description: A short interview is conducted to go through your medical history and confirm your health status.

title: DONATION
description: A sterile needle is used to collect blood. The process usually takes around 10 to 12 minutes.

title: REFRESHMENT
description: After donation, you will be provided with drinks and snacks to help your body recover.

title: COMPLETION
description: You are all done! You may resume normal activities while staying hydrated. Thank you for saving lives.
